message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. My starting price is $175. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $160.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.
Bob, I see you're determined to get a good price. I'm willing to drop to $145.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'd really like to make this deal work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go.
